website_summaries.verdict: Gets high marks for its installation, design, and price, although you may go through toggle switches if you expose it to a lot of mud and water.
pros: Comes in both a 3,100 pound and 3,600 pound capacity
cons: Toggle switch is a little on the cheap side and can go bad easily when water gets in it

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Installed on a 2006 Rancher and use it to raise/lower snow plow. Installation was fairly easy and straightforward. Operates in and out smoothly and works on command as expected. Comes with a snatchblock as well which is a nice thing to have if you ever get really stuck and need to double line winch yourself out. I also really like the free-spool option. Being able to reach in, turn the dial to free-spool, and walk away with the hook to let the cable out is very convenient instead of having to press the "out" button the whole time. Great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Simple Life Merchandise

customer_reviews.title: easy install  works well
customer_reviews.text: takes longer to remove front grill than to install winch , may need to modify in/out switch as bracket doesn't fit between brake reservoir and handlebars not sure of it will be close enough ok used for a few months and bolts that hold unit on plate came loose , I take responsibility for that as I should have reviewed and tightened ... but due to only 2 stabilize bars , so uint separated and is broken . before that unit seamed to work correctly . looking at units w 4 stablizing bars , if I cant find may buy again when at normal price not inflated price .
customer_reviews.author: Christian Von Roch

customer_reviews.title: Great ATV Winch
customer_reviews.text: At the time Best Buy, this Bear Claw winch is well built, has the power needed, bolted on my ATV no problem. Comes complete with heavy duty solenoid, wires, remote in-out switch, roller fairlead, snatch block, hardware for mounting. I liked it so much I bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Airbear41

customer_reviews.title: Works with the warn hard wear and mount
customer_reviews.text: Fit better than the warn that I had on that wasn’t working right. Use the old warm mount and wiring system with no problems ( I did have to change the wires around so the switch would work- in was out and out was in reverse the motors wires solved it
customer_reviews.author: Zombie

customer_reviews.title: Installed on Honda recon.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. I installed it on my sons 2016 Honda recon. Works like a champ. Very solid heavy duty winch. My boy has worked the winch in various ways too. Pulling trees to double blocking and pulling a truck out of the mud. It comes with everything to successfully install it. Good buy. I had to buy the rubber stopper that installs on hook.
customer_reviews.author: jwilkins

customer_reviews.title: great winch kit
customer_reviews.text: great winch kit. not as strong as the superwinch it replaced but it was half as much. I feel the capacity is likely oversold by twice but still a better kit than something I could find at Hazard Fraught. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am very happy
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the winch on my Suzuki Eiger. Didn't come with a mountiny plate so I am glad I ordered one just in case because I heard some of these winches come with universal mounting plates. All in all quality of everything looked very well and install wasent too hard after you get going. I would suggest splicing and installing a in line fuse block on the power side from the battery just in case something goes wrong down the road. I used a 25 mini amp fuse and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Awesome winch
customer_reviews.text: This winch is high quality and the installation was easy on a 2013 Polaris Spottsman 500. This winch was used for my snow plow and the rocker switch is well made and a smaller unit. I'd buy this winch again.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Winch is good, switch sucks if gets wet at all.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve had. The switch went bad on the first. Now it has happened again apparently on the second. Said my return window has closed. Sucks. Have a trip to WV planned in two weeks and now I will not have a winch. Worked great while it worked. The winch itself is solid. But the switch goes bad if any light water gets in it. Got caught in a rain storm the other day and needed it, but didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great winch, plenty of power for off road buggy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great winch and includes everything needed to bolt up to your off road vehicle. I've used this winch more to pull others out but on several occasions I've had the need to pull me up large hills or out of several feet deep mud holes. Thanks for a solid dependable product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Mounted it on a small tractor to raise and lower the snowblade. Does a great job
customer_reviews.author: L. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use a universal remote
customer_reviews.text: Good product, fair price, but lacks remote. Unable to use universal remote
customer_reviews.author: Trikerjon

customer_reviews.title: Bad switch. Keep it dry.
customer_reviews.text: The winch fit and worked great. After 3 uses the switch (in/out) stopped working. The switch will only spool out. I should also mention it was raining when the switch quit. I assume the switch is not water proof.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Good winch
customer_reviews.text: Really nice little unit. I love the handle bar mounted remote.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton and Rayelle

customer_reviews.title: Electrical failure
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as expected. After a year and a half the relay contactor or switch burned up. I went to start up the 4x4 and power wires started melting. I need to contact manufacturer to get a electrical components.
customer_reviews.author: Ertaious

customer_reviews.title: Worked and fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Great winch kit for the money. I bought this winch with the bracket for my exact four wheeler model from the same brand and everything fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: Broke after very first time I tried to use it, it's been over a month since I returned it to the manufacturer & still no replacement,
customer_reviews.author: alaska

customer_reviews.title: I have had this for several years now. No ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several years now. No problems. Its a little bit slow for snow plowing but for the price it's worth the money. I have had it in water, snow and mud. It keeps working.
customer_reviews.author: Chris bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I going to work great on my custom motorcycle trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for my new ATV, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: easy install, easy instructions, done in an hour,,,,,My ATV is only 650lbs, so the 3100lb winch should get me out of most mudholes
customer_reviews.author: darrell j murray

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: it came with all the hardware needed to install. i fabricated a mount and installed completely in les than 3 hours
customer_reviews.author: Jam selena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, everything is there to do a clean professional install.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Caves

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great winch installed on a quad very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Very complete quality unit
customer_reviews.text: Real quality unit. Comes very complete with remote relay (solenoid), all heavy duty wire and lugs, and heavy roller fairlead. Smooth and powerful

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: The size wasn’t too big wasn’t too small just right. The snatch block was good to have also, small though. This was perfect for my trailer to pull up lawn more’s fours Wheelers and Other atv objects
customer_reviews.author: charlene sharble

customer_reviews.title: Great winch.
customer_reviews.text: Great winch..only thing it could use is a plug in remote...but very strong. Easy wiring...nice everything is metal not a cheap plastic spool release...i would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: snow plow lift
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit has everything you need. looks great and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Gregson

customer_reviews.title: Not fully operational
customer_reviews.text: Installed and only one side of switch works, won't work half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Brock

customer_reviews.title: Mounts easily I had to find somewhere to mount relay
customer_reviews.text: Mounts easily I had to find somewhere to mount relay. Works so far haven't used it much. Got it for my snow plow. Best part it comes with everything you need to connect it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with return of a bad unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, i just got them installed a few days ago and went to start up my quad the battery was dead. I checked everything and the winch runs super slow. So I was gonna try to return it for another but am having a hard time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Great winch
customer_reviews.text: I will use to raise and lower snow plow blade.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: good little unit
customer_reviews.text: mounted in the shop trailer. will pull very good we use it to load dollied bike for transport
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Works great, all of the stuff was with it to make easy install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install came with every thing neede and works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the quality of the winch the directions weren't the best but thats prob because i didnt read them too ...
customer_reviews.text: installed on a 07 arctic cat 650 h1 and i was 1st impressed with the quality of the winch the directions weren't the best but thats prob because i didnt read them too many words and not enuf pics lol but its all color coated wiring and good quality the only thing i think they cheeped out on is the actual handle bar mount for the rocker switch but that was no big deal i would buy this again and again great product for the money *update after a couple months on the quad and like 250 miles it stopped working you push the button and it only clicks
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great investment!!! Use it all the time to load wood on the pickup truck.
customer_reviews.author: George Garcia

customer_reviews.title: effective and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant when I bought an off brand winch but I was pleasantly surprised when I installed and used the winch the first time. My only real complaints are the toggle switch is very cheaply made and wish the wires were another foot longer Soni could route the wires a little easier on my yamaha kodiak 400.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska living

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and pulls well very good value. I Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: and easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: A little slow, but very powerful, and easy to mount. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Tony lehman

customer_reviews.title: I bought the Extreme Max Bear Claw for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Extreme Max Bear Claw for my husband and he had already had to use and he loves it....Thank You for the prompt delivery!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: Item defective, I suppose to pay labor twice, work very bad creating electrical problems to an atv
customer_reviews.author: Pupik

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Good price. Probably not as good as a waren winch but cost lot less and for atv I can't see wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Marcell

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and complete kit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this winch after looking at several others, mainly due to the overall completeness of the kit and, what I perceived to be, high quality construction. I was not disappointed when I received the package and, after installation, was able to test by pulling my boat (about 3500 lbs, with tires at about 5 psi from sitting for 2 years) about 5 feet saving me from having to get my truck into the back driveway. The winch performed without a whimper; the biggest issue was getting the ATV to not get pulled into the boat (the brakes held, but the tires were just on the edge of traction).
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: winch
customer_reviews.text: The fairlead was not attached so had to figure out how to attatch that, as we used it on the trk. To pull motorcycle up ots not built for that but we made it work. And it works great.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Good winch
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with the uniplow. Works great. Button to retract does feel a little bit cheap
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Max Bear Claw winch
customer_reviews.text: Had to take it to a shop to get it installed. The color coded wires are all black! Have a call in to the seller to find our how to hook it up without burning up the motor. The shop is running into the same problem. Call not returned.
customer_reviews.author: kati

product_meta.title: Extreme Max 5600.3072 Bear Claw ATV/UTV Deluxe Winch Package - 3100 lb
feature_bullets: Includes 3100 lb. Bear Claw winch, 45' steel cable, roller fairlead, snatch block, mounting hardware, battery cable, motor cable and connectors; Extreme Max Bear Claw 5600.3072 High Output 3100 lb. with 2800 lb. Footprint ATV/Utility Deluxe Winch Package
3600 lb. of pull in 3500 lb. footprint, with low amp draw, high efficiency and low noise
Dynamic braking system and triple planetary gear box; sealed for water resistance
4-bolt mounting provides a universal fit for all brands of winch mounts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars75 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
